instructions: 直走經過右手邊的Abstract Group。
目的地就在前方的 Lumio。

companies.name: Lumio 3D
companies.description: Lumio 3D Co., Ltd. develops high-fidelity 3D reflectance and geometry scanning technologies, specializing in rapid and precise 3D face scanning for medical, cosmetic, and VR applications. Their H3 3D Face Scanner and software enable high-resolution, real-time 3D facial modeling, supporting pre-surgical planning and digital communication between doctors and patients.
